mapper.insert: insert into member (username, password, name, email, phone, joinday, totalpurchase, grade, login_fail_count, enabled, role, point_money) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone_number}, #{joinday}, #{totalpurchase}, #{grade}, #{loginFailCount}, #{enabled}, #{role}, #{point})
mapper.select: select count(username) from member where username = #{username}
select username from member where name=#{name} and email = #{email}
select * from member where username = #{username} and name=#{name} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update member set login_fail_count = login_fail_count + 1, enabled = case when login_fail_count + 1 >= 5 then 0 else enabled end where username = #{username}
update member set login_fail_count = 0 where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select point_money from member where username = #{username}
mapper.update: update member set point_money = point_money + #{points} where username = #{username}
